channel.title: svg on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in svg on Konigi

item.title: RGBA feColorMatrix
item.description: An SVG filter that changes colors based on a transformation matrix.

item.title: Ai to Canvas Plug-In
item.description: The Ai->Canvas plug-in enables Adobe Illustrator to export vector and bitmap artwork directly to an HTML5 canvas element that can be rendered in a canvas-enabled browser. The plug-in provides drawing, animation and coding options such as events so that you can build interactive, well-designed canvas-based web apps. http://visitmix.com/labs/ai2canvas/

item.title: When can I use... HTML5, CSS3, etc.
item.description: Can I Use provides compatibility tables for features in HTML5, CSS3, SVG and other upcoming web technologies. http://caniuse.com/
